headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense to Deliver Portable Chemical Detectors to US Customs and Border Protection to Aid in Narcotics Crackdown
summary: BOSTON, October 20, 2025--Teledyne FLIR's Griffin G510x chemical identifier will support US CBP efforts to combat drug trafficking and the spread of illegal narcotics.

content.title: Teledyne FLIR Defense to Deliver Portable Chemical Detectors to US Customs and Border Protection to Aid in Narcotics Crackdown
content.summary: BOSTON, October 20, 2025--Teledyne FLIR's Griffin G510x chemical identifier will support US CBP efforts to combat drug trafficking and the spread of illegal narcotics.

thumbnail.caption: Teledyne FLIR Defense announced that it has received an order from U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) for 15 of its Griffin™ G510x portable chemical detectors, specifically designed to analyze and identify explosives and narcotics, such as fentanyl and nitazenes, within five minutes. The detectors will be fielded across the U.S. to help CBP identify the most challenging drug samples, such as those containing fentanyl in extremely low concentrations. The Griffin G510x has proven uniquely capable of confirming lethal narcotics ‘hidden’ within other substances and cutting agents, where they are commonly missed by other field portable devices.
